page.title: 10SPORTS - OLD KILPATRICK
page.content:
When asked about the provision of sports facilities in the village, the general opinion of the locals was that there were virtually none at the moment and that the building of a sports complex was long overdue.
{Individual requests included: Tennis courts More football pitches Swimming pool Swing parks; playgrounds for younger children.
The older age group requested a community hall where they could meet for snooker; cards; darts; bingo and concerts or just to have a chat over a cup of tea or coffee. A place where the elderly, the unemployed and the young mothers could all meet.
